name: Nutritive Heat Protecting Styling Cream for Dry Hair
categories: Hair, Hair Styling & Treatments, Hair Styling Products
about: What it is:A nourishing heat protecting leave-in cream that protects against heat damage, reduces frizz, and easily detangles for medium to thick dry hair..Hair Texture:Straight, Wavy, Curly, and Coily.Hair Type:Medium and Thick.Hair Concerns:- Dryness.Key Benefits:- Nourishes and protects against heat up to 450 u00b0F.Highlighted Ingredients:- Plant-Based Proteins: Nourishes hair with essential nutriments and helps retain moisture..What Else You Need to Know:This anti-frizz nourishing leave-in cream protects against heat up to 450u00b0F, adds deep nutrition, and provides more strength and manageability for dry medium to thick hair. It is formulated with plant-based proteins and niacinamide, to provide deep conditioning, making hair easy to comb and detangle for stronger hair. This cream is also loved by pro stylists, this leave-in reduces frizz and flyaways while giving hair instant suppleness and radiant shine with a smooth satin touch..Fragrance Description:This cream has a fresh and floral composition, with top notes of ylang, royal jelly, and violet leaves for a clean scent, middle notes of wild rose, jasmine, and tonka bean to capture the floral aroma, and bottom notes of sandalwood, white cedarwood, and cinnamon...Clinical Results:In a controlled study using Nutritive Heat Protecting Styling Cream for Dry Hair, results showed:
ingredients: -Plant-Based Proteins: Nourishes hair with essential nutriments and helps retain moisture..-Niacinamide: Locks in hydration for long-lasting hair strength...Aqua / Water / Eau, C13-16 Isoalkane, Propylene Glycol, Dimethicone, Triethanolamine, Phenoxyethanol, Peg/Ppg-17/18 Dimethicone, Carbomer, Potato Starch Modified, Behentrimonium Chloride, Hydroxypropyl Guar, Caprylyl Glycol, Polyquaternium-4, Amodimethicone, Panthenol, Niacinamide, Ascorbyl Glucoside, Butylene Glycol, Isopropyl Alcohol, Linalool, Hydroxycitronellal, Benzyl Salicylate, Benzyl Alcohol, Hexyl Cinnamal, Citronellol, Trideceth-6, Hydrolyzed Wheat Protein, Alpha-Isomethyl Ionone, Coumarin, Hydrolyzed Corn Protein, Hydrolyzed Soy Protein, Limonene, Iris Florentina Root Extract, Cetrimonium Chloride, Citric Acid, Parfum / Fragrance.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-After shampooing and conditioning, apply a quarter-sized amount to clean, towel-dried hair..-Do not rinse..-Massage onto lengths and ends..-Blow-dry or air-dry..-Heat style as usual to achieve the desired look...Pro Tip:.-Use as a heat protectant before heat styling..-Apply product onto mid-lengths and ends for seamless detangling and frizz reduction for a sleek finish. .Complete the routine with Nutritive 8H Magic Night Serum (sold separately) in the evening for maximum hydration benefits.

reviews.review_buyer_description: brown hair
reviews.review_text: I bought this because of Lisa Barlow and my hair has never looked shinier. Thanks Lisa!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I used this to blow dry my hair with a flat brush and my hair has never dried so straight and frizz free.

reviews.review_title: No more high body count hair
reviews.review_buyer_description: brown hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: does your hair look cheap? does it look pornish? does it look like high body count hair? if you said yes to all of theseu2026.you know what? you do need Kerastase Thermatique

reviews.review_title: smells as amazing as it works
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brunette hair, Porcelain skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I received a sample sachet of this and have been using it when I blow my hair dry or use styling tools. It smells so good and my long hair feels really soft for days after. I'm trying to milk my sample so it won't run out too soon but I'll definitely need to save up to buy a full size bottle.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Kerastase is my go to hair brand. I am obsessed with their products and my husband needs to pull me out this section to get me back to planet earth ;D

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Kerastase! WHY did you change the formula of this product???? The old product with u201cIris Royalu201d was FANTASTIC! It left my hair smooth, soft, and so shiny and manageable. And it smelled nice. This new version with Niacinamide is absolute garbage. It leaves my hair feeling like STRAW making it so hard to untangle. I was literally fighting with my hair!!! And the smell isn't as pleasant. Please bring back the old formula!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Light and didn't leave my hair feeling heavy like other products do.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The treatment comes packaged in a squeezable tube, which dispenses just the right amount of product. The cream and orange color scheme gives it a fresh yet sophisticated look. I applied a small amount (roughly the size of two peas) throughout the mid-lengths and ends of my damp locks. Be careful not to use too much, or else your hair will feel sticky and stiff. Although the product is white in color , it turns invisible on application. The consistency is like a lotion but feels weightless on hair. The scent can be off-putting to some, as the fragrance is reminiscent of that of a sunscreen.  Once I combed the product through, I used a blow dryer to style my tresses. The result? Instantly softer hair! The leave-in treatment left my hair smoother, shinier, and untangledu2026 a state it hasnu2019t been in for over 3 months! Surprisingly, the product also helped diminish the frizz I had resigned myself to.  Iu2019ve been using this baby consistently for the past 2 weeks, and Iu2019ve never been happier with my hair! Since it is a heat protectant as well, my mane has stayed healthy despite several run-ins with a flat iron. If you are looking to transform your dehydrated locks, then this is definitely the product for you!

reviews.review_title: Will never do my hair with out this again !
reviews.review_text: been using this all month absolutely eliminated my frizz issue that had me looking like alfalfa. This is a great leave in that doubles as a heat protectant. My hair has been doing so much better since using this

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have only used this when blow drying my hair, but it has felt less frizzy and looks way more put together than usual. Cream feels light and not overpowering. I have hair that gets tangled very easily and I found I was also able to use my detangling spray in conjunction with this cream.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love this product! Itu2019s made my hair so soft, smooth and shiny. It also smells so good! I would definitely recommend this to others!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have been impressed by this product line and I would recommend trying the shampoo and conditioner together as well as this heat protectant!! I have fine hair that is colored and very frizzy, naturally curly but I blow dry it straight. This works perfectly to add extra protection and is heavy enough to actually smooth without weighing down or making my hair greasy (apply on ends of hair only). Definitely recommend if you're in a frizz situation as well!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product for free in exchange for my honest review. I did not enjoy the Kerastase Nutritive Heat Protecting Styling Cream for Dry Hair. This product has a strange scent. I was gifted this, but have fine hair while it says it is best for medium to thick hair. All it did was weigh my hair down.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Kerastase kindly gave me this heat protectant for free so that I could review it. I really enjoy how this product is working so far and helping my hair feel more hydrated and smoother. Iu2019m used to spray heat protectors so this feels like a significant upgrade, I can get it distributed better throughout my hair. Certainly my new favorite and would absolutely repurchase!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Love this product.  It is a great add on to my hair routine and does not take a lot to have a big impact.

reviews.review_title: Better than shampoo and conditioner, but not great
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The shampoo and conditioner that go with this were very drying and did not make my hair feel good. This product helped some, it did make my hair softer and helped with drying, but I think I wouldnu2019t have needed it if the shampoo wasnu2019t so dry.

reviews.review_title: Heat Protection with a Nice Scent
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received the Kerastase Nutritive Heat Protecting Styling Cream as a gift to review, and I couldnu2019t be happier with it. This cream smells amazing and a little goes a long way. After using it, my hair isnu2019t frizzy and doesnu2019t feel greasy at all. It provides excellent heat protection and leaves my hair looking smooth and shiny. I use it right after I shower and before I do anything with my hair and even when I curl my hair, the product seems to help me hold my curls. I give it a 5/5!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This cream leaves my fine and relaxed hair feeling nice and soft! It also helped with strangling too which was a nice bonus. The scent is light and clean, not overpowering at all.

reviews.review_title: Not the quality I am used to from Kerastase
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this as a free sample from Buzz Agent for my honest review. I always use top notch products on my very thin and fragile hair and Kerastase is my go to brand for heat protection. I absolutely Love their Discipline Smoothing milk and splurge on it often. This has a very light scent. It tends to leave my hair feeling drier than normal. During and after styling I feel like my hair is not as soft as it is normally. If you have more oily hail, this would probably be a great product, but just not for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Pricy product, but it produces great results when blow drying!  It did not weigh down my fine hair and left a pleasant scent.

reviews.review_title: Add it to your routine asap
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Yes!! This leave in conditioner is great it leaves my hair soft, silky and frizz free which is key. I  leave it in my hair and let my hair air dry before using any hot tools and my hair dries soft and sleek without the frizz. It smells great and protects my hair from any heat damage. Love it! I will be purchasing it again and definitely recommend it>

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019ve been using Nectar Thermique for a few weeks now, and Iu2019m really impressed with how it protects my hair from heat damage. It leaves my hair feeling soft, smooth, and nourished after blow-drying and styling. I also appreciate that it doesnu2019t weigh my hair down or leave a greasy residue, which is a plus for my fine hair. The scent is pleasant without being overpowering. My only reason for giving it 4 stars instead of 5 is the priceu2014while itu2019s worth it for the quality, itu2019s a bit on the expensive side. Overall, a great product for keeping hair healthy and protected!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: After using this a couple of times, I think I'll give it to a friend with thicker hair. I have fine, straight hair. It makes my hair feel heavy and sticky and harder to blow dry. I would not recommend this cream for someone with hair like mine.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: A little goes a long way. The first time I used tooooo much and left my hair oily. But gave it another try with just a drop and that made a world of difference. Left my hair so smooth and silky

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this heat protector. I use this when my hair is still damp and then use my blow brush to do my hair and it leaves it shiny and healthy looking. The smell is minimal. It also keep my frizz down as well.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I apply it to damp hair and then I use a dryer and finish with an iron or curler. It has helped me to keep my ends from splitting, prevents breakage, and also leaves it super soft. The finish is gorgeous!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product was just okay for my hair type. It weighed my fine hair down and made it a bit greasy. I do however love the smell of the product.

reviews.review_title: A new staple in my haircare routine!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: If I could recommend any product from Kerastase, it's the Nutritive Heat Protecting Styling Cream for Dry Hair. I am a girl that loves to straighten their hair so it's pin straight but absolutely hate how some pieces will get frizzy. This product makes such a huge difference! My hair stays perfect no matter how humid it is. I've also noticed my hair looks less frizzy when I do my heatless curls as well. The second time I tried this product, I did a blow out and my hair looked flawless. This product is 100% worth every penny!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: A fabulous heat protectant that smells wonderful as well as works wonders. I have fine, then delicate strand, tangle, and break easily and this was a savior for me

reviews.review_title: Better than the shampoo and conditioner
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This actually smells good compared to the shampoo and conditioner of this line. Itu2019s also probably the best product out of the line. Itu2019s a bit pricey for the quality. I enjoy much cheaper hair products over this one. My hair is soft afterwards though.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was given the opportunity to test and review the Keratase Nutritive Protecting Styling Cream for Dry Hair for free. And this is what I think: Upon my first use, I was unimpressed. While my hair was wet it felt drier than before with other brands. The instructions on the label tell you to use the amount of two drops. Two drops?? What does that mean? It's a cream, so is that a pea-sized amount? Drops the size of a dime?? However, after figuring out the right amount for my hair (turned out to be a nickel sized blob) and combining with other products in the line (shampoo and condtioner) and drying, I was very happy with the result! My hair was smooth and soft and remained that way for a few days (I do not wash my hair every day). I think this is a great product--I did not have any problems with my fine hair being weighed down or being dried out. The only thing I don't like is the vagueness of the amount to be used, how hard it is to find English on the label, and price point when I will want to purchase it in the future :)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Kerastase Nutritive Heat Protecting Styling Cream is absolutely a must have for dry hair. I actually couldn't believe the difference it made for my hair. Frizz was for sure reduced and my hair looks silky smooth and very shiny. I am very impressed with this product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Very nice leave in. I like to use after the Kerastase Shampoo and conditioner, it makes so easy to style my hair with blow dry.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This leave in is such a game changer. I am always looking for a good heat protectant and this has already made my hair look and feel sooo much better I would buy this product again and again and recommend it to anyone!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: After using this for a few week, i would say that it does improve the frizzy in my hair however if we are talking about the heat protection then i wouldnt recommended it withou heat protection. Overall i like it and would totally buy it again! Did i mention that it smells amazing too?

reviews.review_text: I have been using the Nutritive product line for a little while now, and have to say for the price point, I'm disappointed with my results. Out of the entire product line, this cream is the best thing...but it doesn't leave my hair feeling much different than a $8 leave in condition from Walmart.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love this product, it has transformed my dry summer hair and helped keep it silky smooth without adding too much weight. If you suffer from summer frizz or dryness, I would definitely recommend you try this product - really improved my blowouts. A little bit of this goes a long way so just be mindful when applying

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brunette hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I always You is a leave-in hair conditioner after my shampooing and conditioner in the shower. I like that this one also has a heat protectant. I have extremely long hair that goes down to my hips I apply this product from ear length to ends before blow dryer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: this stuff is so far incredible iu2019ve used the shampoo, conditioner and leave in ONCE and my damaged curly hair already looks and feels so much healthier. the shampoo gives you a squeaky clean feel after one wash and the conditioner (which has the same feel as lotionud83dude2d) gives you all the moisture back the leave in left my hair soooo silky shiny and smooth after pressing it out too! def recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This heat protective cream did a very nice job on my hair. The first time I think I used a little too much and it weighed my hair down, but the second time I used it I used just a pea size amount and it left my hair feeling just beautiful.
love this! My hair feels so hydrated even after straightening and curling my hair

reviews.review_text: I love Nutritive Heat Protecting Styling Cream for Dry Hair because this product keep my hair in place in no time especially I need to stay in outdoor in this hot summer.It is very easy to apply without any mess, so that my hair can back in place in no time.

reviews.review_title: Would give 0 stars if I could...
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My hair looks better when I don't put this in it. Absolutely horrendous. Left my hair looking rough and dry. Don't waste your money on this.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Like everything else in the line, it's a great hair product that smooths and protects against frizz while protecting from heat. Wish the packaging was easier to use but still a good hair styling cream. (gifted from BzzAgent)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019ve been using this for a week and can definitely see a difference.  Helps to reduce frizz and makes hair look healthy

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this leave in conditioner! I started using this before I tried using it in combination with the shampoo and conditioner. It has saved my hair from being fried after swimming in pools, spending days at the beach, and years of hot iron tools. This is a staple in my hair routine. It keeps my blonde highlights looking refreshed instead of fried.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: No more frizz and split ends after using this. My hair all looks like one length and sealed up. Definitely a keeper in my hair routine

reviews.review_title: A must have hair heat protectant

reviews.review_text: I received the Nectar Thermique Heat Protectant from Bzzagent complimentarily to try and review and I have to admit I am obsessed, my hair is naturally less hydrated than Iu2019d prefer but my hair has been really dry especially from the summer sun and just use of heat to style my hair. Iu2019ve been using it for a couple weeks now and Iu2019ve already noticed a difference, granted I have been using this product with the shampoo and the conditioner. I love all of these products and this brand, I will definitely be purchasing this brand and this product again. 15/10 recommend, go get yours today!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I use this product before using my hair straightener or curler. It leaves a beautiful shine afterwards even when I use heat against it. There is no burn smell of the hair after I use it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This product really does it all! It helps with my frizz, as well as helps my hair from extreme heat. It smells really good and it leaves my hair, super soft and without frizz, which is really important and hard to find! Loveee it

reviews.review_title: Smells so good! So much shine
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love the smell,consistency, and shine I receive from this product. I definitely need to add something else from the line though to reach the amount of softness and hydration I am looking for. Great product with great results when blown out and styled. Phenomenal actuallyu2026but air dried didnu2019t do so well for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I normally do not use any kind of heat on my hair as even with heat protectant my hair still damages.  With this Nectar Heat Protectant, my hair looks and feels so much healthier. My hair looks like I had a fresh blowout!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The Kerastase Thermique Heat Protectant has surpassed my expectations, shielding my hair from heat styling tools while adding shine and reducing frizz. My hair feels remarkably soft, nourished, and healthier with each use. Although their products are pricey, their effectiveness and longevity make them well worth the investment, significantly improving my hair's condition and yielding impressive results.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brunette hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Here's my first impression... Scent: light, fresh. Hair just smells clean. Hair loss during blow dry/styling: typical amount, minimal. Feel: hair feels super soft After drying: hair looks frizzy, but it feels super soft. Styling with a thermal brush helps to control the frizz after the initial blow dry. I'll need to continue using for a few more weeks, but so far I enjoy using this system.  Received product for free in exchange for honest review.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love the way my hair looks and feels after using! Very smooth and also smells great! Loves how it protects against heat!! Definitely a win!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Tan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: it did receive this free from bzzagent for my honest review and I have to say the combination of the heat protection and shampoo and conditioner is a trio I highly recommend for all hair types.this is truly amazing!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brunette hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using this for 6 months now and what a difference in my hair! This is a cream  leave in protector that doesn't weigh down my hair at all! I use it on my wavy hair and my daughter's super curly hair. Totally recommend!

reviews.review_title: Great Product, but the Packaging Needs Improvement
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The Kerastase Nutritive Heat Protecting Styling Cream for Dry Hair works wonders on my hair, leaving it soft, smooth, and well-protected from heat styling. Itu2019s definitely one of the best styling creams Iu2019ve used for dry hair, and the results are consistently impressive.  However, the packaging leaves much to be desired. The cap is particularly frustratingu2014it's difficult to unscrew and screw back in place, especially when Iu2019m in the middle of styling my hair. Given the premium price point, I expected more user-friendly packaging. I really hope Kerastase considers improving the design of their caps because the product inside is fantastic, but the packaging experience detracts from it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Gray eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was using this product for so long prior to this plant based formula. The OG made my hair soft, healthy, and kept frizz away. This product left my hair dry, felt heavy, and just damaged my hair. Bring back the old formula!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Gray eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have obsessed over this product for years.. I see the product has now been reformulated and itu2019s completely changed. Horrible sticky greasy mess that makes my hair tough to comb during blow dry. I am so disappointed and now outside return window.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this, makes my hair so soft and feathery light

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: After using over some period of time , I have to say I love this. It made my hair silky smooth and very hydrated. If someone has a problem with dry hair or damaged hair, this is the stuff to use. Loved it

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using this heat protectant for a few weeks and am loving it. I use heat tools several times a week. Not only is this an amazing, nice-smelling heat protectant but it leaves my hair feeling silky smooth and incredibly hydrated. I have noticed a significant difference in the health and appearance of my hair since using this. Very impressed!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This leave in heat protectant keeps my hair feeling nourished and moisturized! I have long hair, and Iu2019ve had it over processed for years, and yet I still tend to use heat tools on my hair daily. This product has seemed to magically work over night, fixing issues Iu2019ve had for years, and visibly showing a difference, for the better! I would recommend to anyone who uses hot tools, or who just has an issue with dryness! The consistency is creamy, it smells nice, and leaves no residue in the hair! Great product!   *I received this product in exchange for this post

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Finally found my product!! This heat protectant is not sticky and adds hydration to the max. It smells great, protects my hair, and leaves it silky smooth. I've tried so many & am so grateful I found this to use forever now!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This cream really helped to hydrate my hair. The smell is amazing as well.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product is absolutely amazing!!! It made my freshly bleached hair feel like silk !! It made it so smooth ans silk with no frizz. And it smells soooooo good! I havenu2019t been this impressed with a product in a long time.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Great, just buy it! I have a frizzy hair and really curly so using this before blow out is a game changer itu2019s not greasy or anything itu2019s just great. Donu2019t be afraid cuz itu2019s cream fourmla

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: After using this product for the last couple of weeks it's made my hair incredibly soft and beautiful. It's been feeling much healthier and not dry the scent is amazing and I definitely recommend this product

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: After using this product for a couple of weeks it left my hair frizz free and smooth. Only down sound is it smells natural.

reviews.review_text: Use this for blow drying after you washing my hair. Coupled with the conditioner my hair is left super soft. I wish the cap was connected instead of separate piece to screw on and off. Smells good but does not linger.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using the heat protecting style cream for my dry hair for the past two weeks- my hair definitely looks smoother and shinier.  My hair looks very nice! However, I do not like the way it feels on my hands- if you're texture averse, this may or may not bother you.  It feels kind of slimy/slippery versus a thick creamy feeling.  Smells clean.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: After using this product for the last 3 weeks, Iu2019ve really seen a difference in my hair. It makes my hair so silky smooth and easy to detangle. It also helps with frizz, which is amazing!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using this product for about 2 weeks and I love it. I wish the scent was a little less.. powdery/milky? But it is an almost neutral smell. I would recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: For someone with fine hair, it took a while to figure out the right amount to use. I use very little, but then worry if my hair is adequately protected from heat. For the cost, I wish it was a little easier.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019ve used this product for a little bit over 3 weeks and my hair loves it! My hair is extremely thick and curly, so it definitely needs a boost of moisture more often than not. This styling cream is worth it! Plus it smells amazing, so.. win-win!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This product is truly amazing!! As someone with very frizzy, curly hair, I was beyond excited when I received this product. I knew it could potentially tame my curls, especially when I straighten my hair. Typically when I straighten my hair, by the second or third day it starts to frizz out, so I was excited to put this product to the test. And let me tell you, it exceeded my expectations because of the difference it made on my hair  After using it to straighten my hair, my hair was silky smooth and pin straight. This product is so good my hair lasted a week and half where  I typically have to wash my hair out by day 5 due to the frizz. However, It stayed sleek and frizz-free. I can not rave enough about heat protection though. After washing my hair, I noticed no heat damage, which was shocking to me  considering my past experiences with heat protectants. I always experienced some sort of heat damage. My friends even told me that they didnu2019t see any heat damage in my hair, which was surprising to hear that they noticed. This made me so happy because they know how much I love my curls and the amount of damage I usually get when straightening it. Overall, as you can see I loveee this product and I would repurchase it. I just want to mention that this product was sent to me for free, but I am giving honest and genuine review based on my experience.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Applied this after washing my hair and it results in beautiful shiny refreshed hair . This product takes my hair from dry to soft to the touch hair . Itu2019s a must have and I have told all my girlfriends about this product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product in return of my honest review*  While using this and the conditioner product, I noticed my hair was fluffier. After styling my hair, I did notice more shine. Restricts my hair a little from have as much movement, maybe I used a little too much product. It does come out a little bit on the runnier side. Overall, I enjoyed trying the Nutritive heat protecting styling cream.

reviews.review_title: A Silky Treat for Your Hair
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Hey there, lovely people! So, Iu2019ve been using the Kerastase Nutritive Nectar Thermique for a little while now, and let me tell you, itu2019s been a pretty fab addition to my hair routine. First things first, that scent u2013 itu2019s like a bouquet of flowers decided to have a party in my bathroom. Now, if youu2019re into fragrances, you might just fall head over heels for it. But fair warning, itu2019s definitely not subtle. If youu2019re sensitive to strong smells, proceed with caution. Now, performance-wise, this stuff is legit. Itu2019s like a silky hug for your hair. My strands feel smoother, and Iu2019ve noticed less frizz u2013 especially when Iu2019m blow-drying or straightening. Plus, it doesnu2019t weigh my hair down, which is a major win. But hereu2019s the tea: itu2019s a bit of a splurge. Yeah, itu2019s not exactly budget-friendly, but sometimes you gotta treat yourself, right? A little goes a long way, though, so that tube lasts longer than a Netflix binge. Would I recommend it? Totally! If youu2019re cool with the scent and want to invest in healthier locks, give it a whirl. Just sniff before you commit u2013 you know, in case the floral fiesta isnu2019t your jam. Hope this helps someone out there on their hair journey!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Gray eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: As a longgggg time user of It's a 10, I was excited to try this leave in conditioner instead. So far, I'm really enjoying how it makes my hair feel after blow drying! It isn't greasy and the smell isn't offensive, however it does have fragrance to it. My hair has been shiny and softer, much like what I was using before.
Product works well. Good for dry hair before blow dry

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have tired them all, or so I had thought.  I know enjoy that just left the salon feeling at home EVERYDAY! I can now blow dry and heat treat my hair daily and guilt free.  Plus, the scent is amazing.  I truly am in love with this product.  I have them both the leave in and the rinse out and they are both so great. I can't find a single thing that I do not like about either of them.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using this product for about 2 weeks now and I LOVE it!!!  It smells so good.  Using this product on my hair after the shower has made it feel incredibly soft and way less frizz. Definitely something needed in my life!!  I absolutely will repurchase this! thank youud83dude0a

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product for free in exchange for my honest opinion. As someone with thick wavy hair I really like this product. Itu2019s great for moisture & doesnu2019t leave my hair feeling greasy.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product for free in exchange for my honest opinion and Iu2019m impressed! The quality of the Nutritive Heat Protecting Styling Cream is top tier and itu2019s become an important part of my hair styling routine! The formula is creamy and rich (and smells REALLY GOOD) and it goes on smooth without leaving any sort of heavy/greasy feeling to the hair. I do think this has helped my fly aways and breakage since I started using it. It does have a heavy scent and the price is quite high, but youu2019re paying for the quality in my opinion and it is worth it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have used this product for about 2 weeks and I love it, it makes my hair soft and less frizzy. It doesn't make your hair oily and It leaves my dry hair soft and manageable

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: After using this product a couples of times to style my hair with a heat tool it works amazingly. It leaves my hair soft and feeling healthy!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Another great product from the brand. This is a thick treatment and added needed moisture to my hair without weighing it down.

reviews.review_buyer_description: black hair
reviews.review_text: I received this product for free and am definitely enjoying it! As someone who uses a lot of heat on my hair, a lot of heat protectants I use sometimes feel very tacky on my hair. This product did wonders for taming my hair though - I naturally have very course and frizzy hair, and this product was able to get rid of most of my frizz and made my hair look very sleek and shiny. I would definitely recommend, however be mindful that it does have a bit of a strong scent.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This product smells good and does work well with my hair!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've used this product for about a week and I've gotten so many compliments! My hair feels smooth and is super shiny. This will remain in my routine for sure!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product for free in exchange for my honest opinion and I've become a big fan. It's definitely a really good heat protector. The formula is lightweight so it doesn't make my hair greasy on the contrary... my hair looks healthy and it shines like a diamond after using this product.  I definitely recommend it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product in return for my honest review and here are my thoughts: Pros: -I generally like most Kerastase products and I trust the brand -I liked the texture and consistency of the cream -I did like the scent -I do like the heat protecting element of the product Cons: -This was not intended for my hair type. I have thin/fine hair and an oily scalp. This very quickly made my hair look and feel weighed down although I used a minimal amount. -The price is a bit high in my opinion but if it worked perfectly for my hair, then I might have had a different opinion on the price  Overall I still believe Kerastase is a good brand and would recommend this to a friend whose hair type it is intended for.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Deep skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: After applying this product to my hair before blow drying, I've seen a definite increase in my hairs appearance! This heat protectant/styling cream has made my hair super glossy and soft. I would recommend this to anyone with straight- loose curl type hair because the cream can make your hair curl up.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I received this for free in exchange for an honest review     It seems pretty nice so far at making my hair a little easier to manage as far as frizz. Iu2019m transitioning to grey, which is harder to manage. A little DOES go a long way with this. Only use a few drops!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love haircare products. Growing up my mom was a cosmetologist so I've always had a love for product. My hair is waist length, thick, and curly. On average my hair is pretty dry and tends to be lackluster so the use of product is vital to my hairs health. After using this product just once I could see and more importantly feel the brilliance and lustre it added to my hair. My hair felt light and soft and healthy. I would recommend this product to anyone that wants soft, luminous, and healthy hair.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This creamy floral scented leave in makes my fine thin hair silky smooth! I love that it makes my hair perfectly straight and not frizzy if I air dry or blow dry. It doesnu2019t weigh my hair down. I wish the scent was less floral perfumey but still really love it.

reviews.review_title: A staple in my haircare routine!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I was so excited to receive the KERASTASE Nutritive Heat Protecting styling creme in exchange for an honest review! The first thing I noticed upon receiving was the amazing scent! This smells so good! I love that it provides heat protection! This product doesnu2019t weight down my hair at all! This has became a staple in my hair are routine!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I was thrilled to be given the Nectar Thermique Heat Protectant to try out in exchange for my honest opinion and itu2019s a total win for me. I have very dry, fine but straight hair. Even though it isnu2019t marketed for fine hair, I found it worked perfectly on my long fine hair. I had been wanting some extra protection as I heat style my hair several times a week. I used very small amount through the ends and about half way up and styled as normal. My hair was silky soft. It felt hydrated and smooth. I was worried that the next day my hair wouldnu2019t hold curl, but it was the opposite. I curled my hair the next day and it held all day so no worries about making your hair too soft or slick to style. I didnu2019t find this product to weigh down my hair at all (but use a very small amount if you have fine hair). The scent is nice and not overpowering.I like the idea of plant-based proteins. The product delivers on its promise and itu2019s a staple in my hair care routine now.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: My hair has always been oily and in the last 6 months it has become very dry and frizzy. I started using this paired with the conditioner and noticed a difference immediately. It has been about 2 weeks and my hair feels great.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Great heat protector. Light formula that doesnu2019t leave a heavy or sticky feeling.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I recieved this product complimentary from BzzAgent and Kerastase for review purposes.  Kerastase Nectar Thermique Heat Protectant is a game-changer for my hair! Not only does it shield my strands from heat damage during styling, but it also leaves them feeling incredibly smooth and silky. I love how lightweight it is, and the fact that it doesn't weigh down my hair or leave any residue. With continued use, my hair looks and feels healthier than ever before. I can't recommend this product enough!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: After using this product the past week or two I had noticed such a huge difference in my hair I have naturally curly hair and this has made my hair softer more manageable my hair is shiny and has no frizz now which was a huge problem for me I don't need much just a couple of drops and evenly distribute it through my hair after a shower while my hair is still damp I love how my hair look now I received this as a free sample but the review and the opinion is my own

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have used many products over the year and actually only wash my hair once a week but use a flat iron everyday and also curl at least 3-4 days a week, I was blown away after using this product. Not only did it feel great, no grease, no nasty feel when it dried and no additional weight it is the first product I have used that helps keep that annoying frizz at bay. I use to always carry dryer sheets but now don't have to. I will definitely continue to use this product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have loved using this cream so far. I only need to use a little bit to spread it throughout my damp hair. My hair doesnu2019t feel heavy or greasy after this, and it feels smooth and soft. I like that itu2019s also a heat protectant.

I used this once when blowing out my hair in place of a cream I used to use. There was a HUGE difference in my hair. I have naturally curly/wavy hair and this made it as smooth as silk and added great shine. Loved this

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Ingredients changed! I emailed company they said it wouldnt change. I bought a new bottle & It leaves a gross sticky feel, no shine! Not the same!! Money wasted, will never buy!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Definitely can see less breakage!! I really love it! I only use this now!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Nutritive Heat Protecting Styling Cream for Dry Hair is great! The scent is amazing and it leaves my hair feeling more hydrated therefore less frizz! This is my go to when Iu2019m out of the shower and before I style my hair. It takes literally no time to put a dab in my hands and work it through my hair. A little goes a long way. I have very thick hair and it only takes a little bit for me to see and feel a difference! I received this product via BzzAgent in exchange for an honest review.
